name: Lost in the Mythic Island
storyline: Long ago the world was at war with itself. The Races was on the brink of destruction. However we were saved by a rift, a tear, in space time that had appeared seemingly out of nowhere. The Rift whisked a good amount of The races away and took us to this new and strange world. It was unlike anything I had ever seen before. We were taken into a new world that we had never seen before. And it will take a while for us to understand what is going on. Why are here, or how we return home. But life will be a full of many things till we find those answers.
summary:
Lost in the Mythic Island (LitMI) is a MMO (Massive Multiplayer Online) Game. 
 
The core idea is based on the most known First Person Shooter games, altough it has nothing to do with them! 
 
The game features many game modes, from which the players can choose! 
 
First comes the base story mode, then the death match and finally the capture the flag. 
 
 
 
Story Mode: Inside you will play based on the game story in an open world, where you will find scary creatures, meet other players, form guids and of course you have to survive! 
 
Death Match: Players are spawned inside a map, where they have to kill each other, reaching the maximum score in order to win the game. 
 
Capture the Flag: This is the only team mode, where your goal is to capture enemy's flag and bring it to your base. 
 
 
 
The game includes many unique features, like custom physics, also it compines many type of games, like Role Playing, Survival and Shooter games.
